title: The Most Satisfying Highland Cow Cleanup Ever

subtasks: Identify the cow as the dirtiest in the world.
Apply water to the cow's body.
Use special brushes to remove dirt.
Scrub the cow's massive shaggy coat.
Remove caked mud from the cow's eyes.
Stand next to the cow as it patiently tolerates the washing.
Allow dirt to be washed away.
Successfully clean the cow and make it famous.
Watch the video to the end.
